metadata.synopsis: A Bhaal Cultist in the Temple of Bhaal.

0.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal Hivune
0.text: What will you do now, I wonder? With all of Bhaal's adherents at your command... Oh, the possibilities.
0.context: NodeContext: imagining a world of slaughter at the player's wake

1.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal Hivune
1.text: You rejected your own blood. Your unholy provenance. You are no child of Bhaal.
1.context: NodeContext: quivering, confused, shocked - yout turned down a boon from his god

2.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal Hivune
2.text: He allowed you - an unfaithful whelp - to behold him... Only for the Bastard Child of Murder to spurn him. Blasphemy.
2.context: NodeContext: quivering, confused, shocked - yout turned down a boon from his god

3.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal Hivune
3.text: You were permitted to look upon a god, whelp. Count yourself lucky to walk with Bhaal's chosen.

4.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal Hivune
4.text: You are forsaken, Bastard Child of Murder. There is no place for you here.
4.context: NodeContext: quivering, confused, shocked - yout turned down a boon from his god

5.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal Hivune
5.text: Truly a magnificent display of brutality. I expected nothing less of one of Bhaal's children.

6.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal Hivune
6.text: Only a fool would keep Lady Orin waiting. She is at the altar.
